blogData.title: Merry Christmas 2020! Thank You From Video Translator
blogData.description: Thank you everyone for all your support. Its been an exciting year, and we hope you found peace and happiness in this festive season!
blogData.keywords: it has been an exciting year, videotranslator, Thank you for your support, Merry Christmas

data.richContent:
What a year itâ€™s been! From getting locked down, to the great conjugation!

Obligatory Dancing Santa!

Thank You

Thank you everyone for all your support! We want to wish you and yours a Merry Christmas!

Everyone who engaged with us, others that offered feedback, and folks who made a purchasing decision - thank you very much.

Thank you to everyone whose time, thoughts and work touched our lives.

We hope that your holiday season is joyful and surrounded by friends, family and good cheer, and next year is filled with wins virus free!

Thank you,

Team VideoTranslator

nodes.title: Gratitude, Growth, and Greetings: Reflecting on 2023
nodes.description: Join us in expressing heartfelt gratitude as we look back on an incredible year, filled with the support of our amazing prospects, loyal customers, dedicated collaborators, and our exceptional staff. We're thrilled to welcome new team members and embark on exciting new contracts in 2024. Wishing you a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!
nodes.coverAlt: Gratitude, Growth, and Greetings: Reflecting on 2023

nodes.title: Bridging Languages, Unleashing Global Potential: Introducing Our New Website and App
nodes.description: Discover our website and app, with native multilingual support and powerful transcription, translation, and voiceover capabilities in 120 languages.
nodes.coverAlt: Bridging Languages, Unleashing Global Potential: Introducing Our New Website and App

nodes.title: We Just Completed CSIRO's Innovate To Grow Program
nodes.description: VideoTranslator just completed participation in the CSIRO Innovate To Grow Program.
nodes.coverAlt: VideoTranslator just completed participation in the CSIRO Innovate To Grow Program.
